```typescript
import { clsx, type ClassValue } from "clsx";
import { twMerge } from "tailwind-merge";

export function cn(...inputs: ClassValue[]) {
  return twMerge(clsx(inputs));
}

```

```typescriptreact
import * as React from "react";
import { cva, type VariantProps } from "class-variance-authority";
import { cn } from "@/lib/utils";

const buttonVariants = cva(
  "inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-full font-medium transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50",
  {
    variants: {
      variant: {
        default: "bg-[#081f02] text-[#b1f128] hover:opacity-90",
        outline: "border border-[#1f261e] bg-transparent hover:bg-[#0b0f0a]",
        ghost: "hover:bg-[#0b0f0a]",
      },
      size: {
        default: "px-6 py-3 text-lg",
        sm: "px-4 py-2 text-sm",
        lg: "px-8 py-4 text-lg",
      },
    },
    defaultVariants: {
      variant: "default",
      size: "default",
    },
  }
);

export interface ButtonProps
  extends React.ButtonHTMLAttributes<HTMLButtonElement>,
    VariantProps<typeof buttonVariants> {}

const Button = React.forwardRef<HTMLButtonElement, ButtonProps>(
  ({ className, variant, size, ...props }, ref) => {
    return (
      <button
        className={cn(buttonVariants({ variant, size, className }))}
        ref={ref}
        {...props}
      />
    );
  }
);
Button.displayName = "Button";

export { Button, buttonVariants };

```

```css
@import "tailwindcss";

:root {

  --bg-cta: #081f02;
  --bg-shade-40: #156200;
  --stroke: #1f261e;
  --primary-cta: #b1f128;
  --body-text: #b5b5b5;
  --title-text: #ffffff;
  --mute-text: #7c7c7c;
  --error-status: #ff5c5c;
  
  --background: #010501;
  --foreground: #ffffff;
}

@theme inline {
  --color-background: var(--background);
  --color-foreground: var(--foreground);
  --font-sans: var(--font-geist-sans);
  --font-mono: var(--font-geist-mono);
}

body {
  background: var(--background);
  color: var(--foreground);
  font-family: var(--font-geist-sans), Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
}
```

Some files downloaded from Figma were PNGs but saved with `.svg` extensions. Next.js Image couldn't render them correctly.

### Files fixed
1. Chain icons: renamed from `.svg` to `.png`
   - `chain-1.png` through `chain-5.png`
2. Chain badge: renamed from `.svg` to `.png`

3. TWC token logo: renamed from `.svg` to `.png`

```javascript
const fs = require('fs');
const path = require('path');

// Function to convert PNG to SVG by embedding as base64
function convertPngToSvg(pngPath, svgPath) {
  try {
    // Read the PNG file as base64
    const pngData = fs.readFileSync(pngPath);
    const base64Data = pngData.toString('base64');
    
    // Get image dimensions (we'll use a standard size, or you can use sharp to get actual dimensions)
    const width = 24;
    const height = 24;
    
    // Create SVG wrapper with embedded PNG
    const svgContent = `<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<svg width="${width}" height="${height}" viewBox="0 0 ${width} ${height}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
  <image width="${width}" height="${height}" xlink:href="data:image/png;base64,${base64Data}"/>
</svg>`;
    
    // Write SVG file
    fs.writeFileSync(svgPath, svgContent);
    console.log(`Converted ${pngPath} to ${svgPath}`);
    return true;
  } catch (error) {
    console.error(`Error converting ${pngPath}:`, error);
    return false;
  }
}

// Convert all PNG files in chains directory
const chainsDir = path.join(__dirname, '../public/assets/chains');
const iconsDir = path.join(__dirname, '../public/assets/icons');
const logosDir = path.join(__dirname, '../public/assets/logos');

// Convert chain files
const chainFiles = ['chain-1', 'chain-2', 'chain-3', 'chain-4', 'chain-5'];
chainFiles.forEach(file => {
  const pngPath = path.join(chainsDir, `${file}.svg`); // They're currently .svg but contain PNG data
  const svgPath = path.join(chainsDir, `${file}.svg`);
  if (fs.existsSync(pngPath)) {
    convertPngToSvg(pngPath, svgPath);
  }
});

// Convert chain-badge
const chainBadgePath = path.join(iconsDir, 'chain-badge.svg');
if (fs.existsSync(chainBadgePath)) {
  convertPngToSvg(chainBadgePath, chainBadgePath);
}

// Convert twc-token
const twcTokenPath = path.join(logosDir, 'twc-token.svg');
if (fs.existsSync(twcTokenPath)) {
  convertPngToSvg(twcTokenPath, twcTokenPath);
}

console.log('Conversion complete!');
```

Fixing the conversion script to handle the double-wrapped SVGs:


```javascript
const fs = require('fs');
const path = require('path');

// Function to convert PNG to SVG by embedding as base64
function convertPngToSvg(pngPath, svgPath) {
  try {
    // Read the PNG file as base64
    const pngData = fs.readFileSync(pngPath);
    const base64Data = pngData.toString('base64');
    
    // Get image dimensions (we'll use a standard size, or you can use sharp to get actual dimensions)
    const width = 24;
    const height = 24;
    
    // Create SVG wrapper with embedded PNG
    const svgContent = `<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<svg width="${width}" height="${height}" viewBox="0 0 ${width} ${height}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
  <image width="${width}" height="${height}" xlink:href="data:image/png;base64,${base64Data}"/>
</svg>`;
    
    // Write SVG file
    fs.writeFileSync(svgPath, svgContent);
    console.log(`Converted ${pngPath} to ${svgPath}`);
    return true;
  } catch (error) {
    console.error(`Error converting ${pngPath}:`, error);
    return false;
  }
}

// Convert all PNG files in chains directory
const chainsDir = path.join(__dirname, '../public/assets/chains');
const iconsDir = path.join(__dirname, '../public/assets/icons');
const logosDir = path.join(__dirname, '../public/assets/logos');

// Convert chain files
const chainFiles = ['chain-1', 'chain-2', 'chain-3', 'chain-4', 'chain-5'];
chainFiles.forEach(file => {
  const pngPath = path.join(chainsDir, `${file}.png`);
  const svgPath = path.join(chainsDir, `${file}.svg`);
  if (fs.existsSync(pngPath)) {
    convertPngToSvg(pngPath, svgPath);
  }
});

// Convert chain-badge
const chainBadgePngPath = path.join(iconsDir, 'chain-badge.png');
const chainBadgeSvgPath = path.join(iconsDir, 'chain-badge.svg');
if (fs.existsSync(chainBadgePngPath)) {
  convertPngToSvg(chainBadgePngPath, chainBadgeSvgPath);
}

// Convert twc-token
const twcTokenPngPath = path.join(logosDir, 'twc-token.png');
const twcTokenSvgPath = path.join(logosDir, 'twc-token.svg');
if (fs.existsSync(twcTokenPngPath)) {
  convertPngToSvg(twcTokenPngPath, twcTokenSvgPath);
}

console.log('Conversion complete!');
```

All assets are now in SVG format. Summary:

## Solution implemented

### Problem
Figma exported some assets as PNGs, not SVGs, even when saved with `.svg` extensions.

### Solution
1. Downloaded the PNG files from Figma
2. Created a conversion script that embeds PNG data as base64 inside SVG wrappers
3. Converted all PNG files to valid SVG format
4. Updated all code references to use `.svg` extensions

```css
@import "tailwindcss";

:root {
  /* Design System Colors from Figma */
  --bg-dark: #010501;
  --bg-semi: #0b0f0a;
  --bg-cards: #121712;
  --bg-cta: #081f02;
  --bg-shade-40: #156200;
  --stroke: #1f261e;
  --primary-cta: #b1f128;
  --body-text: #b5b5b5;
  --title-text: #ffffff;
  --mute-text: #7c7c7c;
  --error-status: #ff5c5c;
  
  --background: #010501;
  --foreground: #ffffff;
}

@theme inline {
  --color-background: var(--background);
  --color-foreground: var(--foreground);
  --font-sans: var(--font-geist-sans);
  --font-mono: var(--font-geist-mono);
}

body {
  background: var(--background);
  color: var(--foreground);
  font-family: var(--font-geist-sans), Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
}

/* Custom gradient utilities for background elements */
.bg-gradient-radial {
  background: radial-gradient(circle, var(--tw-gradient-stops));
}
```

## Implementation summary

### 1. Background decorative elements (3 designs)

#### Arrow-like gradient (bottom layer - z-0)
- Positioned at the bottom center, behind all elements
- Uses multiple gradient layers with rotation for depth
- Opacity: 0.25
- Blur: 80px and 60px
- Responsive: scales with container width

#### Chart visual 1 (middle layer - z-10)
- Positioned top-left (desktop only)
- Radial gradients with multiple circular glows
- Opacity: 0.18
- Blur: 100px, 80px, 60px
- Hidden on mobile/tablet

#### Chart visual 2 (middle layer - z-10)
- Positioned top-right (desktop only)
- Radial gradients with multiple circular glows
- Opacity: 0.15
- Blur: 90px, 70px, 50px
- Hidden on mobile/tablet

### 2. Swap card UI updates

#### Gradient glows
- Top edge: 3-layer gradient glow (main line, blur layer, soft outer glow)
- Bottom edge: 3-layer gradient glow matching top
- Below Connect button: 3-layer gradient glow with adjusted opacity

#### Visual details
- Backdrop blur for depth
- Border radius: rounded-3xl (24px)
- Border: 1px solid #1f261e
- Z-index: 30 (foreground)
- Overflow: hidden to contain glows

### 3. Layering and z-index

```
z-0:  Arrow-like gradient (bottom layer)
z-10: Chart visuals 1 & 2 (middle layer)
z-20: Main content container & chart sections
z-30: Swap card (foreground)
```

### 4. Responsive design

- Desktop (lg+): All background elements visible, full layout
- Tablet (md): Background elements scaled, layout adapts
- Mobile: Chart visuals hidden, arrow gradient remains, layout stacks vertically

### 5. Technical details

- Colors: Using design system colors (#b1f128 for glows)
- Opacity: 0.150.25 for background elements, 0.30.4 for card glows
- Blur: 2px100px depending on element
- Positioning: Fixed for backgrounds, relative for content
- Pointer events: Disabled on background elements

## Implementation summary

### 1. Background elements repositioned

#### Arrow gradient (node-id=3279-70471)
- Changed from `fixed` to `absolute` positioning relative to the cards container
- Positioned at the bottom with negative offsets: `bottom-[-100px]` to `bottom-[-200px]` (responsive)
- Scales from 280200px (mobile) to 728690px (2xl)
- Hidden on mobile (`hidden sm:block`)
- Stays anchored to the bottom of the cards container

#### Chart visual 1 (node-id=3279-70468)
- Positioned absolutely at `bottom-[-80px]` to `bottom-[-180px]` (responsive)
- Left-aligned with negative left offset for proper positioning
- Scales from 300250px (lg) to 600500px (2xl)
- Hidden until lg breakpoint
- Stays anchored to the bottom-left of the cards area

#### Chart visual 2 (node-id=3279-70472)
- Positioned absolutely at `bottom-[-80px]` to `bottom-[-180px]` (responsive)
- Right-aligned with negative right offset
- Scales from 280240px (lg) to 550450px (2xl)
- Hidden until lg breakpoint
- Stays anchored to the bottom-right of the cards area

#### Chart visuals 3-4 (grouped together)
- Grouped in a single container (node-ids: 3279-70474, 3279-70475)
- Positioned at the top of the cards container
- Only visible on 2xl screens (`hidden 2xl:block`)
- Positioned together with consistent spacing
- Scales appropriately for very large screens

### 2. Structural changes

- Cards container: Created a relative container wrapping the flex layout
- Background elements: All positioned absolutely within the cards container
- Padding: Added responsive bottom padding (`pb-[200px]` to `pb-[400px]`) to the flex container to accommodate background elements
- Z-index: Maintained proper layering (z-0: arrow, z-10: charts, z-30: cards)

### 3. Responsive behavior

- Mobile (< sm): Only arrow gradient visible, scaled down
- Tablet (sm-md): Arrow gradient scales up
- Desktop (lg-xl): Arrow gradient + Chart visuals 1 & 2 visible, all scale appropriately
- Large desktop (2xl): All 5 background elements visible, full size

### 4. Positioning strategy

- Negative bottom values: Elements extend below the cards, creating the "covered by cards" effect
- Relative to cards container: Elements move with the cards, not the viewport
- Responsive offsets: Bottom offsets scale with screen size to maintain visual relationship
- Overflow visible: Ensures elements can extend beyond container boundaries

### 5. Visual integration

- Elements stay anchored to the bottom of the cards regardless of screen size
- Proper scaling ensures elements look proportional on all devices
- Chart visuals 3-4 are grouped and only appear on very large screens
- No separation between elements and cards on different screen sizes

The implementation ensures that:
- Arrow gradient and chart visual 1 stay at the bottom of the cards
- Elements scale down on smaller screens instead of moving up
- Chart visuals 3-4 are grouped and hidden on smaller screens
- All elements maintain their relationship to the cards across screen sizes

The background elements are now "tied" to the cards and will maintain their position relative to the cards regardless of screen size.

## Position updates

### Arrow gradient
- Before: `bottom-[-100px]` to `bottom-[-200px]` (too far down)
- After: `bottom-[-50px]` to `bottom-[-180px]` (moved up)
- Result: About 50% of the gradient is visible under the cards

### Chart visual 1
- Before: `bottom-[-80px]` to `bottom-[-180px]` (mostly hidden)
- After: `bottom-0` to `bottom-[-100px]` (moved up)
- Result: More visible, starting at the bottom edge of cards

### Chart visual 2
- Before: `bottom-[-80px]` to `bottom-[-180px]` (mostly hidden)
- After: `bottom-0` to `bottom-[-100px]` (moved up)
- Result: More visible, starting at the bottom edge of cards

### Bottom padding
- Before: `pb-[200px]` to `pb-[400px]` (too much space)
- After: `pb-[100px]` to `pb-[220px]` (reduced to match new positions)

## Summary

- Arrow gradient: Moved up so ~50% is visible directly under the chart and swap card
- Chart visuals 1 & 2: Moved up to start at the bottom edge of the cards for better visibility
- Chart visuals 3-4: Already positioned at the top (10% from top), grouped together
- All elements remain anchored to the cards container and scale responsively

## Position adjustments

### 1. Arrow gradient  moved up
Location: Line 127

Before:
```tsx
bottom-[-50px] sm:bottom-[-80px] md:bottom-[-100px] lg:bottom-[-120px] xl:bottom-[-150px] 2xl:bottom-[-180px]
```

After:
```tsx
bottom-[-20px] sm:bottom-[-30px] md:bottom-[-40px] lg:bottom-[-50px] xl:bottom-[-60px] 2xl:bottom-[-80px]
```

Change: Reduced negative values by ~30100px across breakpoints to move it up and sit closer under the cards.

---

### 2. Chart visual 1  moved down
Location: Line 144

Before:
```tsx
bottom-0 sm:bottom-[-20px] md:bottom-[-40px] lg:bottom-[-60px] xl:bottom-[-80px] 2xl:bottom-[-100px]
```

After:
```tsx
bottom-[-40px] sm:bottom-[-50px] md:bottom-[-60px] lg:bottom-[-70px] xl:bottom-[-90px] 2xl:bottom-[-110px]
```

Change: Increased negative values by 40px to move it down for better visibility and alignment.

---

### 3. Chart visual 2  moved down
Location: Line 160

Before:
```tsx
bottom-0 sm:bottom-[-20px] md:bottom-[-40px] lg:bottom-[-60px] xl:bottom-[-80px] 2xl:bottom-[-100px]
```

After:
```tsx
bottom-[-40px] sm:bottom-[-50px] md:bottom-[-60px] lg:bottom-[-70px] xl:bottom-[-90px] 2xl:bottom-[-110px]
```

Change: Increased negative values by 40px to match Chart Visual 1 and move it down.

---

### 4. Bottom padding  reduced
Location: Line 198

Before:
```tsx
pb-[100px] sm:pb-[120px] md:pb-[150px] lg:pb-[180px] xl:pb-[220px]
```

After:
```tsx
pb-[80px] sm:pb-[100px] md:pb-[120px] lg:pb-[140px] xl:pb-[160px]
```

Change: Reduced padding by 2060px to remove extra white space while keeping elements visible.

- Arrow gradient: Positioned higher, ~50% visible directly under the cards
- Chart visuals: Moved down 40px for better visibility
- Alignment: Charts and arrow gradient are better aligned with no white space
- Responsive: All adjustments scale across screen sizes

### 1. Navigation bar

- Scaled logo: `h-8 w-8 sm:h-9 sm:w-9 md:h-10 md:w-10`

- Scaled nav buttons: `px-3 py-2 lg:px-4 lg:py-3` with `text-base lg:text-lg`
- Scaled icon sizes: `w-5 h-5 sm:w-6 sm:h-6`

### 2. Status bar
- Scaled padding: `px-4 sm:px-6 md:px-8 lg:px-10` and `py-3 sm:py-3.5 md:py-4`
- Scaled gaps: `gap-3 sm:gap-4 md:gap-6 lg:gap-8 xl:gap-10`
- Scaled font sizes: `text-base sm:text-lg` for numbers, `text-sm sm:text-base` for labels
- Scaled icons: `w-5 h-5 sm:w-6 sm:h-6` for chain/market icons
- Scaled dividers: `h-10 sm:h-11 md:h-12`

### 3. Main container
- Scaled padding: `px-4 sm:px-6 md:px-8 lg:px-10` and `py-4 sm:py-5 md:py-6 lg:py-8`

### 4. Chart card (desktop)
- Scaled padding: `p-3 sm:p-3.5 md:p-4`
- Scaled border radius: `rounded-xl lg:rounded-2xl`
- Scaled font sizes: `text-sm sm:text-base` for title, `text-xs sm:text-sm` for subtitle
- Scaled heights: `h-[320px] lg:h-[400px] xl:h-[450px] 2xl:h-[500px]`

### 5. Swap card
- Scaled width: `lg:w-[480px] xl:w-[540px] 2xl:w-[606px]` (proportional from 606px)
- Scaled padding: `p-4 sm:p-5 lg:p-6`
- Scaled border radius: `rounded-2xl lg:rounded-3xl`

- Scaled font sizes:
  - Input numbers: `text-[26px] sm:text-[29px] lg:text-[33px]`
  - Labels: `text-xs sm:text-sm`
  - Buttons: `text-base sm:text-lg`
- Scaled icon sizes: `w-5 h-5 sm:w-6 sm:h-6`
- Scaled token selector: `h-10 w-10 sm:h-11 sm:w-11 lg:h-12 lg:w-12`

### 6. Background elements
- Arrow gradient:
  - Scaled sizes: `w-[220px] h-[160px] sm:w-[320px] sm:h-[240px] md:w-[400px] md:h-[300px] lg:w-[480px] lg:h-[380px] xl:w-[580px] xl:h-[460px] 2xl:w-[728px] 2xl:h-[550px]`
  - Scaled positions: `bottom-[-15px] sm:bottom-[-20px] md:bottom-[-25px] lg:bottom-[-35px] xl:bottom-[-45px] 2xl:bottom-[-60px]`
- Chart visual 1:
  - Scaled sizes: `w-[240px] h-[200px] lg:w-[320px] lg:h-[280px] xl:w-[400px] xl:h-[360px] 2xl:w-[480px] 2xl:h-[400px]`
  - Scaled positions: `bottom-[-45px] sm:bottom-[-55px] md:bottom-[-65px] lg:bottom-[-70px] xl:bottom-[-85px] 2xl:bottom-[-100px]` and `lg:left-[-40px] xl:left-[-60px] 2xl:left-[-80px]`

  - Scaled positions: same bottom values as Chart 1, with `lg:right-[-30px] xl:right-[-50px] 2xl:right-[-60px]`
- Chart visuals 3-4: scaled for 2xl screens

### 7. Bottom padding
- Scaled: `pb-[80px] sm:pb-[95px] md:pb-[110px] lg:pb-[125px] xl:pb-[145px] 2xl:pb-[160px]`

### 8. Mobile chart section
- Scaled padding and heights: `h-[250px] sm:h-[300px] md:h-[350px]`
- Scaled border radius: `rounded-xl sm:rounded-2xl`

## Scaling approach

- Base design: 1720px
- Target screens: 1366px (79% scale)
- Method: proportional scaling using Tailwind breakpoints
- Breakpoints: `sm:640px`, `md:768px`, `lg:1024px`, `xl:1280px`, `2xl:1536px`

All values scale proportionally while maintaining:
- Visual hierarchy
- Layout structure
- Spacing relationships
- Component proportions

The layout matches the Figma design across screen sizes from 1366px to 1720px+, with elements scaling proportionally and the structure preserved.

```css
@import "tailwindcss";

:root {
  /* Design System Colors from Figma */
  --bg-dark: #010501;
  --bg-semi: #0b0f0a;
  --bg-cards: #121712;
  --bg-cta: #081f02;
  --bg-shade-40: #156200;
  --stroke: #1f261e;
  --primary-cta: #b1f128;
  --body-text: #b5b5b5;
  --title-text: #ffffff;
  --mute-text: #7c7c7c;
  --error-status: #ff5c5c;
  
  --background: #010501;
  --foreground: #ffffff;
}

@theme inline {
  --color-background: var(--background);
  --color-foreground: var(--foreground);
  --font-sans: var(--font-geist-sans);
  --font-mono: var(--font-geist-mono);
}

body {
  background: var(--background);
  color: var(--foreground);
  font-family: var(--font-geist-sans), Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
}

/* Custom gradient utilities for background elements */
.bg-gradient-radial {
  background: radial-gradient(circle, var(--tw-gradient-stops));
}

/* Marquee animation for mobile status bar */
@keyframes marquee {
  0% {
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
  100% {
    transform: translateX(-50%);
  }
}

.animate-marquee {
  animation: marquee 30s linear infinite;
}
```

```css
@import "tailwindcss";

:root {
  /* Design System Colors from Figma */
  --bg-dark: #010501;
  --bg-semi: #0b0f0a;
  --bg-cards: #121712;
  --bg-cta: #081f02;
  --bg-shade-40: #156200;
  --stroke: #1f261e;
  --primary-cta: #b1f128;
  --body-text: #b5b5b5;
  --title-text: #ffffff;
  --mute-text: #7c7c7c;
  --error-status: #ff5c5c;
  
  --background: #010501;
  --foreground: #ffffff;
}

@theme inline {
  --color-background: var(--background);
  --color-foreground: var(--foreground);
  --font-sans: var(--font-geist-sans);
  --font-mono: var(--font-geist-mono);
}

body {
  background: var(--background);
  color: var(--foreground);
  font-family: var(--font-geist-sans), Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
}

/* Custom gradient utilities for background elements */
.bg-gradient-radial {
  background: radial-gradient(circle, var(--tw-gradient-stops));
}

/* Marquee animation for mobile status bar */
@keyframes marquee {
  0% {
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
  100% {
    transform: translateX(-50%);
  }
}

.animate-marquee {
  animation: marquee 40s linear infinite;
  display: flex;
}
```

## Summary of changes

### 1. Chart placeholder replaced
- Replaced "Chart will be integrated here" with `tradingview.svg` in both desktop and mobile chart sections
- Image scales responsively within the chart container

### 2. TWC token icon fixed
- Changed from `chain-1.svg` to `twc-token.svg` for the TWC token display in the status bar

### 3. Chain icons fixed
- Removed repetition: now uses unique chain icons (1-5) instead of `[1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 1, 2, 3, 4]`
- Each chain icon displays once

### 4. Icon overlap increased
- Increased overlap spacing from `-space-x-0.5/-space-x-1` to `-space-x-2/-space-x-3`
- Icons overlap more for both chain and AMM icons

### 5. Mobile navbar updated
- Separated desktop and mobile button sections
- Mobile shows only the menu button
- Desktop shows settings icon and Connect button

### 6. Mobile status bar with auto-scrolling animation
- Added a marquee animation that scrolls content from right to left
- Content is duplicated for seamless looping
- Animation duration: 40s
- Includes all status bar elements (50+ Active Chains, TWC info, chain icons, 20+ Smart Markets, AMM icons)
- Desktop status bar remains unchanged (no animation)

### CSS animation added
- Added `@keyframes marquee` in `globals.css`
- Animation continuously scrolls the status bar content on mobile devices

All changes are implemented and ready. The mobile status bar now auto-scrolls, and all icons are correctly displayed with proper spacing.

```typescriptreact
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}
```

Restoring the CSS animation class and using it properly:


```css
@import "tailwindcss";

:root {
  /* Design System Colors from Figma */
  --bg-dark: #010501;
  --bg-semi: #0b0f0a;
  --bg-cards: #121712;
  --bg-cta: #081f02;
  --bg-shade-40: #156200;
  --stroke: #1f261e;
  --primary-cta: #b1f128;
  --body-text: #b5b5b5;
  --title-text: #ffffff;
  --mute-text: #7c7c7c;
  --error-status: #ff5c5c;
  
  --background: #010501;
  --foreground: #ffffff;
}

@theme inline {
  --color-background: var(--background);
  --color-foreground: var(--foreground);
  --font-sans: var(--font-geist-sans);
  --font-mono: var(--font-geist-mono);
}

body {
  background: var(--background);
  color: var(--foreground);
  font-family: var(--font-geist-sans), Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
}

/* Custom gradient utilities for background elements */
.bg-gradient-radial {
  background: radial-gradient(circle, var(--tw-gradient-stops));
}

/* Marquee animation for mobile status bar */
@keyframes marquee {
  0% {
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
  100% {
    transform: translateX(-50%);
  }
}

.animate-marquee {
  animation: marquee 40s linear infinite;
}
```

```css
@import "tailwindcss";

:root {
  /* Design System Colors from Figma */
  --bg-dark: #010501;
  --bg-semi: #0b0f0a;
  --bg-cards: #121712;
  --bg-cta: #081f02;
  --bg-shade-40: #156200;
  --stroke: #1f261e;
  --primary-cta: #b1f128;
  --body-text: #b5b5b5;
  --title-text: #ffffff;
  --mute-text: #7c7c7c;
  --error-status: #ff5c5c;
  
  --background: #010501;
  --foreground: #ffffff;
}

@theme inline {
  --color-background: var(--background);
  --color-foreground: var(--foreground);
  --font-sans: var(--font-geist-sans);
  --font-mono: var(--font-geist-mono);
}

body {
  background: var(--background);
  color: var(--foreground);
  font-family: var(--font-geist-sans), Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
}

/* Custom gradient utilities for background elements */
.bg-gradient-radial {
  background: radial-gradient(circle, var(--tw-gradient-stops));
}

/* Marquee animation for mobile status bar */
@keyframes marquee {
  0% {
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
  100% {
    transform: translateX(-50%);
  }
}

.animate-marquee {
  animation: marquee 20s linear infinite;
}
```

## Summary of Changes

### 1. Status bar animation speed
- Reduced animation duration from `40s` to `20s` in `globals.css`
- The marquee animation now scrolls twice as fast

### 2. Mobile navbar design
- Updated mobile navbar to match the Figma design
- Mobile view now shows:
  - Connect button (green background) on the right
  - Hamburger menu icon next to it
- Desktop view unchanged (settings icon + Connect button)
- Breakpoint: `md:hidden` for mobile, `hidden md:flex` for desktop

### 3. Swap arrow positioning
- Fixed arrow positioning to be centered between the "From" and "To" cards
- Changed from absolute positioning (`absolute left-1/2 top-1/2`) to relative positioning with negative margin
- Arrow now uses `relative -my-1.5 sm:-my-2 z-10 flex justify-center` to sit between the two cards
- Works on both desktop and mobile
- Removed the `mt-3 sm:mt-4` from the To section since the arrow handles spacing

### 4. Code cleanup
- Removed `console.log` from the chain icons mapping
- Fixed spacing in the chain icon path (removed extra space)

The swap arrow is now centered between the From and To cards on all screen sizes, and the mobile navbar matches the Figma design.

Fixed the swap arrow positioning. Changes:

## Swap Arrow Positioning Fix

### Changes Made:

1. **Changed from relative to absolute positioning**
   - Switched from `relative -my-1.5 sm:-my-2` to `absolute` positioning
   - Ensures the arrow overlaps both cards

2. **Centered vertically and horizontally**
   - `left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2` centers horizontally
   - `top-1/2 -translate-y-1/2` centers vertically at 50% of the container
   - Positions the arrow in the gap between the From and To cards

3. **Z-index layering**
   - Set `z-20` on the arrow (higher than the cards' `z-0`)
   - Ensures it appears on top of both cards

4. **Visual enhancement**
   - Added `shadow-lg` for better separation

The arrow is now centered between the From and To cards, overlapping both, matching the Figma design. It works on desktop and mobile.

```css
@import "tailwindcss";

:root {
  /* Design System Colors from Figma */
  --bg-dark: #010501;
  --bg-semi: #0b0f0a;
  --bg-cards: #121712;
  --bg-cta: #081f02;
  --bg-shade-40: #156200;
  --stroke: #1f261e;
  --primary-cta: #b1f128;
  --body-text: #b5b5b5;
  --title-text: #ffffff;
  --mute-text: #7c7c7c;
  --error-status: #ff5c5c;
  
  --background: #010501;
  --foreground: #ffffff;
}

@theme inline {
  --color-background: var(--background);
  --color-foreground: var(--foreground);
  --font-sans: var(--font-geist-sans);
  --font-mono: var(--font-geist-mono);
}

body {
  background: var(--background);
  color: var(--foreground);
  font-family: var(--font-geist-sans), Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
}

/* Custom gradient utilities for background elements */
.bg-gradient-radial {
  background: radial-gradient(circle, var(--tw-gradient-stops));
}

/* Marquee animation for mobile status bar */
@keyframes marquee {
  0% {
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
  100% {
    transform: translateX(-50%);
  }
}

.animate-marquee {
  animation: marquee 30s linear infinite;
  will-change: transform;
}
```

- Set to 30 seconds for a smooth, readable scroll
- Linear timing for consistent speed

- Seamless loop with no visible restart

```css
@import "tailwindcss";

:root {
  /* Design System Colors from Figma */
  --bg-dark: #010501;
  --bg-semi: #0b0f0a;
  --bg-cards: #121712;
  --bg-cta: #081f02;
  --bg-shade-40: #156200;
  --stroke: #1f261e;
  --primary-cta: #b1f128;
  --body-text: #b5b5b5;
  --title-text: #ffffff;
  --mute-text: #7c7c7c;
  --error-status: #ff5c5c;
  
  --background: #010501;
  --foreground: #ffffff;
}

@theme inline {
  --color-background: var(--background);
  --color-foreground: var(--foreground);
  --font-sans: var(--font-geist-sans);
  --font-mono: var(--font-geist-mono);
}

body {
  background: var(--background);
  color: var(--foreground);
  font-family: var(--font-geist-sans), Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
}

/* Custom gradient utilities for background elements */
.bg-gradient-radial {
  background: radial-gradient(circle, var(--tw-gradient-stops));
}

/* Marquee animation for mobile status bar - Continuous flow */
@keyframes marquee {
  0% {
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
  100% {
    transform: translateX(-33.333%);
  }
}

.animate-marquee {
  animation: marquee 25s linear infinite;
  will-change: transform;
}
```

## Continuous flow animation fix

### 1. Added a third content set
- Added a third duplicate set of content
- With 3 sets, the animation moves -33.333% (one-third) instead of -50% (half)
- When the first set exits, the second is visible, and the third is ready to enter

### 2. Updated animation
- Changed from `translateX(-50%)` to `translateX(-33.333%)`
- Duration set to 25s
- This creates a continuous loop with no visible restart

### 3. Content included
- 50+ Active Chains text
- TWC token info (icon, price, percentage)
- All 9 chain icons (chain-1 through chain-9)
- 20+ Smart Markets text
- All 7 AMM icons (amm-1 through amm-7)

### How it works
- Content flows from right to left continuously
- When set 1 exits left, set 2 is visible, and set 3 enters from the right
- The animation loops at -33.333%, so the transition is seamless
- No visible break or restart

The animation now shows all content (including Smart Markets icons) scrolling continuously in a seamless loop.

```typescriptreact
                className="[&_path]:stroke-[#b1f128] w-5 h-5 sm:w-6 sm:h-6"
              />
            </button>
            <Button
              onClick={handleConnect}
              className="text-sm lg:text-base px-4 lg:px-6 py-2 lg:py-3"
            >
              Connect
            </Button>
          </div>

          {/* Mobile Right Side - Connect Button and Menu */}
          <div className="md:hidden flex items-center gap-2">
            <Button onClick={handleConnect} className="text-sm px-4 py-2">
              Connect
            </Button>
            <button
              onClick={handleMenu}
              className="bg-[#081f02] p-2.5 rounded-full hover:opacity-90 transition-opacity"
              aria-label="Menu"
            >
              <Image
                src="/assets/icons/menu.svg"
                alt="Menu"
                width={20}
                height={20}
                className="h-5 w-5"
              />
            </button>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </nav>
  );
}
```

```typescriptreact
"use client";

import Image from "next/image";

interface TokenInputProps {
  type: "from" | "to";
  token?: {
    symbol: string;
    chain: string;
    icon: string;
    chainBadge?: string;
  };
  balance?: string;
  amount?: string;
  usdValue?: string;
  onTokenSelect?: () => void;
  onMaxClick?: () => void;
  onAmountChange?: (value: string) => void;
  disabled?: boolean;
}

export default function TokenInput({
  type,
  token,
  balance = "0.00",
  amount = "0.0",
  usdValue = "$0",
  onTokenSelect,
  onMaxClick,
  onAmountChange,
  disabled = false,
}: TokenInputProps) {
  const isFrom = type === "from";

  return (
    <div className="bg-[#0b0f0a] rounded-xl sm:rounded-2xl p-3.5 sm:p-4 lg:p-[18px] relative z-0">
      <div className="flex items-start justify-between gap-3 sm:gap-4">
        <div className="flex flex-col gap-2.5 sm:gap-3 lg:gap-[13px]">
          <p className="text-white font-semibold text-xs sm:text-sm">
            {isFrom ? "From" : "To"}
          </p>
          <button
            onClick={onTokenSelect}
            disabled={disabled}
            className={`flex items-center gap-2 sm:gap-[9px] px-1.5 sm:px-2 py-1.5 sm:py-2 rounded-full transition-colors ${
              isFrom
                ? "bg-[#121712] hover:bg-[#1f261e]"
                : "bg-[#156200] hover:bg-[#1a7a00]"
            } ${disabled ? "opacity-50 cursor-not-allowed" : ""}`}
          >
            {token ? (
              <>
                <div className="relative h-7 w-7 sm:h-11 sm:w-11 lg:h-12 lg:w-12">
                  <Image
                    src={token.icon}
                    alt={token.symbol}
                    width={48}
                    height={48}
                    className="rounded-full w-full h-full"
                  />
                  {token.chainBadge && (
                    <div className="absolute -bottom-0.5 -right-0.5 h-5 w-5 sm:h-[22px] sm:w-[22px] lg:h-6 lg:w-6">
                      <Image
                        src={token.chainBadge}
                        alt="Chain Badge"
                        width={24}

                        className="rounded-full border-2 border-[#121712] w-full h-full"

                  )}
                </div>
                <div className="flex flex-col items-start">
                  <span className="text-white font-semibold text-sm sm:text-lg">
                    {token.symbol}
                  </span>
                  <span className="text-[#7c7c7c] font-medium text-[9px] sm:text-sm">
                    {token.chain}
                  </span>
                </div>
                <Image
                  src="/assets/icons/arrow-down.svg"
                  alt="Dropdown"
                  width={24}
                  height={24}
                  className="w-5 h-5 sm:w-6 sm:h-6"

          {isFrom && (

                <Image
                  src="/assets/icons/wallet.svg"
                  alt="Wallet"
                  width={16}
                  height={16}
                  className="w-3.5 h-3.5 sm:w-4 sm:h-4"
                />
                <span className="text-[#b5b5b5] font-medium text-xs sm:text-sm text-right">
                  {balance} {token?.symbol || ""}

              </div>
              <button
                onClick={onMaxClick}
                className="bg-[#1f261e] text-[#b1f128] font-medium text-xs sm:text-sm px-3 sm:px-4 py-1 sm:py-1.5 rounded-full hover:bg-[#2a3229] transition-colors"

                Max
```

```typescriptreact
"use client";

import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button";
import Image from "next/image";
import TokenInput from "./token-input";
import SwapTabs from "./swap-tabs";

interface Token {
  symbol: string;
  chain: string;
  icon: string;
  chainBadge?: string;
}

interface SwapCardProps {
  activeTab?: "swap" | "limit";
  fromToken?: Token;
  toToken?: Token;
  fromBalance?: string;
  toBalance?: string;
  fromAmount?: string;
  toAmount?: string;
  fromUsdValue?: string;
  toUsdValue?: string;
  onTabChange?: (tab: "swap" | "limit") => void;
  onFromTokenSelect?: () => void;
  onToTokenSelect?: () => void;
  onFromAmountChange?: (value: string) => void;
  onToAmountChange?: (value: string) => void;
  onMaxClick?: () => void;
  onSwapClick?: () => void;
  onConnectClick?: () => void;
  isConnected?: boolean;
}

export default function SwapCard({
  activeTab = "swap",
  fromToken,
  toToken,
  fromBalance = "0.00",
  toBalance = "0.00",
  fromAmount = "0.0",
  toAmount = "0.0",
  fromUsdValue = "$0",
  toUsdValue = "$0",
  onTabChange,
  onFromTokenSelect,
  onToTokenSelect,
  onFromAmountChange,
  onToAmountChange,
  onMaxClick,
  onSwapClick,
  onConnectClick,
  isConnected = false,
}: SwapCardProps) {
  return (
    <div className="flex flex-col gap-2 sm:gap-2.5">
      <SwapTabs activeTab={activeTab} onTabChange={onTabChange} />

      <div className="bg-[#010501] border border-[#1f261e] rounded-2xl lg:rounded-3xl p-4 sm:p-5 lg:p-6 relative z-30 overflow-hidden backdrop-blur-sm">
        {/* Top Edge Gradient Glow */}
        <div className="absolute top-0 left-0 right-0 h-px bg-[linear-gradient(to_right,transparent_0%,rgba(177,241,40,0.4)_50%,transparent_100%)]"></div>
        <div className="absolute top-0 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 w-3/4 h-[2px] bg-[#b1f128]/20 blur-[2px]"></div>
        <div className="absolute -top-px left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 w-1/2 h-[3px] bg-[#b1f128]/10 blur-sm"></div>

        <div className="flex flex-col gap-3 sm:gap-4 relative">
          {/* From Section */}
          <TokenInput
            type="from"
            token={fromToken}
            balance={fromBalance}
            amount={fromAmount}
            usdValue={fromUsdValue}
            onTokenSelect={onFromTokenSelect}
            onMaxClick={onMaxClick}
            onAmountChange={onFromAmountChange}
          />

          {/* Swap Arrow - Absolutely positioned between From and To sections */}
          <div
            className="absolute left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 z-20"
            style={{ top: "calc(50% - 60px)" }}
          >
            <button
              onClick={onSwapClick}
              className="bg-[#1f261e] border-2 border-[#010501] p-1.5 sm:p-2 rounded-lg hover:bg-[#2a3229] transition-colors shadow-lg"
              aria-label="Swap tokens"
            >
              <Image
                src="/assets/icons/arrow-up-down.svg"
                alt="Swap"
                width={24}
                height={24}
                className="[&_path]:stroke-[#b1f128] w-5 h-5 sm:w-6 sm:h-6"
              />
            </button>
          </div>

          {/* To Section */}
          <TokenInput
            type="to"
            token={toToken}
            balance={toBalance}
            amount={toAmount}
            usdValue={toUsdValue}
            onTokenSelect={onToTokenSelect}
            onAmountChange={onToAmountChange}
          />

          {/* Connect/Swap Button */}
          <div className="relative mt-3 sm:mt-4">
            {isConnected ? (
              <Button
                onClick={onSwapClick}
                className="w-full relative z-10 text-sm sm:text-base py-2.5 sm:py-3 lg:py-3"
              >
                Swap
              </Button>
            ) : (
              <Button
                onClick={onConnectClick}
                className="w-full relative z-10 text-sm sm:text-base py-2.5 sm:py-3 lg:py-3"
              >
                Connect
              </Button>
            )}
            {/* Gradient Glow Below Button */}
            <div className="absolute -bottom-2 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 w-3/4 h-[2px] bg-[#b1f128]/20 blur-[2px]"></div>
```

```typescriptreact
              onFromTokenSelect={handleFromTokenSelect}
              onToTokenSelect={handleToTokenSelect}
              onFromAmountChange={handleFromAmountChange}
              onToAmountChange={handleToAmountChange}
              onMaxClick={handleMaxClick}
              onSwapClick={handleSwapClick}
              onConnectClick={handleConnectClick}
              isConnected={false}
            />
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}
```

## Refactoring summary

### 1. Layout components (global, reusable)

#### `components/layout/navbar.tsx`
- Reusable navbar component
- Active route highlighting using `usePathname()`
- Navigation links with Next.js `Link`
- Handlers for Connect, Settings, and Menu (ready for implementation)
- Responsive: desktop and mobile layouts
- Props: none (self-contained)

#### `components/layout/status-bar.tsx`
- Reusable status bar component
- Props: `activeChainsCount`, `smartMarketsCount`, `twcPrice`, `twcChange`, `twcChangeType`
- Mobile marquee animation (3 sets for seamless loop)
- Desktop static layout
- All chain and AMM icons included

### 2. Swap-specific components

#### `components/swap/swap-background-elements.tsx`
- Decorative background visuals
- Arrow gradient and chart visuals
- Self-contained, no props needed

#### `components/swap/trading-chart.tsx`
- Reusable chart component
- Props: `pair`, `timeframe`, `exchange`, `priceData`, `className`
- Ready for chart library integration

#### `components/swap/token-input.tsx`
- Reusable token input component
- Props: `type`, `token`, `balance`, `amount`, `usdValue`, handlers
- Handles "from" and "to" states
- Ready for token selection modals and amount input

#### `components/swap/swap-tabs.tsx`
- Tab switcher component
- Props: `activeTab`, `onTabChange`
- Ready for state management

#### `components/swap/swap-card.tsx`
- Main swap card component
- Composes `SwapTabs` and `TokenInput`
- Props: all swap-related data and handlers
- Handles connected/disconnected states
- Gradient glows included

### 3. Layout integration

#### `app/layout.tsx`
- Added `Navbar` and `StatusBar` to root layout
- Visible on all pages
- Wrapped in dark background container

#### `app/swap/page.tsx`
- Simplified to ~100 lines (from 530+)
- Uses modular components
- Handler functions ready for implementation
- TODO comments for future functionality

## Benefits

1. Modularity: Each component has a single responsibility
2. Reusability: Components can be used across pages
3. Maintainability: Easier to update and debug
4. Scalability: Ready for state management, API calls, and features
5. Type safety: TypeScript interfaces for all props
6. Future-ready: Handler props ready for implementation

## Component structure

```
components/
 layout/
    navbar.tsx          (Global navigation)
    status-bar.tsx      (Global status bar)
 swap/
     swap-background-elements.tsx
     trading-chart.tsx
     token-input.tsx
     swap-tabs.tsx
     swap-card.tsx
```

## Future-ready features

All components include:
- Handler props for user interactions
- TypeScript interfaces for type safety
- TODO comments marking where to add functionality
- Props for dynamic data (tokens, balances, prices)
- State management hooks ready to be added

The codebase is now modular, maintainable, and ready for functionality implementation.

```plaintext
components/
 layout/
    navbar.tsx          (Global navigation)
    status-bar.tsx      (Global status bar)
 swap/
     swap-background-elements.tsx
     trading-chart.tsx
     token-input.tsx
     swap-tabs.tsx
     swap-card.tsx
```

Heres what Ive done and why, based on your button snippet and the Figma design.

### 1. Updated the button to better match the design

In `components/swap/token-input.tsx`, I adjusted the main token selector button so it:

- **Fills the available width and keeps layout stable for longer names**

```tsx
<button
  onClick={onTokenSelect}
  disabled={disabled}
  className={`flex items-center gap-2 sm:gap-[9px] px-1.5 sm:px-2 py-1.5 sm:py-2 rounded-full transition-colors w-full justify-between ${
    isFrom
      ? "bg-[#121712] hover:bg-[#1f261e]"
      : "bg-[#156200] hover:bg-[#1a7a00]"
  } ${disabled ? "opacity-50 cursor-not-allowed" : ""}`}
>
```

- `w-full justify-between` makes the button span the row width and distributes icon/text/chevron cleanly, like in Figma.

### 2. Icon sizing and layout

```tsx
<div className="relative h-5 w-6 sm:h-11 sm:w-11 shrink-0">
  <Image ... />
  {token.chainBadge && (
    <div className="absolute -bottom-0.5 -right-0.5 h-5 w-5 sm:h-[22px] sm:w-[22px] lg:h-6 lg:w-6">
      <Image ... />
    </div>
  )}
</div>
```

- `shrink-0` ensures the token icon never gets squashed when the chain name is long.

### 3. Handling long chain names (truncate instead of breaking layout)

```tsx
<div className="flex flex-col items-start min-w-0 flex-1">
  <span className="text-white font-semibold text-sm sm:text-lg">
    {token.symbol}
  </span>
  <span className="text-[#7c7c7c] font-medium text-[9px] sm:text-[11px] max-w-[140px] sm:max-w-[180px] truncate">
    {token.chain}
  </span>
</div>
```

- `min-w-0 flex-1` lets this block take remaining space.
- `max-w-[140px] sm:max-w-[180px] truncate` keeps the chain text on a single line and adds an ellipsis for very long chain names instead of pushing the arrow or breaking the layout.
- Slightly bumped the sm font size for the chain (`sm:text-[11px]`) so its readable but still clearly secondary to the symbol.
